info.title: Read menu item in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonsize
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Size' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Size" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[3].focus();

user: Read the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
instructions.raw: Read the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar are conveyed
